ygData.subject: Re: Doctrine of Wizardry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehe Levitate eh try finding high ground like a mountain or high zone wall cast levitate and walk out onto nothing 100 ft or more off the ground look down
ygData.messageBody:
Valacian wrote:

> The levitate spell enables you to walk over ground which can be unstable or harmful to our feeble bodies. (Not sure, but I believe you would be harmed if thee walked over Lava)
>
> Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
>

Hehe Levitate eh try finding high ground like a mountain or high zone wall cast levitate and walk out onto nothing 100 ft or more off the ground look down find a target and cast an
offensive spell at it - though it seems about 30 ft you still get hit even though they are well below your floating feet.... have not found levitate too usefull though I did use the
overhead casting on things below and floated out to the aviak island instead of swimming or taking a boat - you also can move yourself down with levitate by looking down and hitting
the arrow key for forward movment unfortunately you cannot go up in the same manner - you will always drop a bit it seems from the height of your starting point as you travel until
you resume your just over the ground levitation height again.

Xzar - looking forward to finding the runes for true flight ability
